channel.title: NyxOnline - Public Beta
channel.description:
[center][b]We are in need of beta testers[/b][/center] Jal and I have started our own development of what is now called NyxOnline, or Nyx. It is based off of 317 PI, and I'm the only one working on the client and server. This is just [my] development thread.
--Some Cool Pic Goes Here--
[b]I've decided that in order to get a better understanding of what the community wants, and what we need to fix, is to open the game up to everyone (though. It was already like that :P). In order to play our game, you need to register on the website below. It gives you access to the downloadable client and the webclient.[/b]
[b]Website:[/b] [url=http://www.nyx-online.info]Nyx-Online[/url] [You must be registered for 90% of the site ;) ] [size=1]approved by Ruby[/size]
[b]Updates[/b] Even with the help of JavaLearner, and the 2 update logs I have, I still manage to forget updates. I've failed to keep a good development log, mostly because I forget. But here's some of what's posted on our site: [code=updates] -Week Four- 60% Herblore has been re-added: 100% Herb cleaning. 70% Clean Herb to Unf. Pot support. 60% Unf. Pot to Potion Support. 70% Grinding materials support. -Note: These numbers are assumed, and most materials are not available to all players at this time. RFD Minigame fixed - The idea is to leave the portals after each wave to restock. Specials have been fixed for some minigames and NPC's. No more "PlayerName has gotten skill X to 99" - It's spam and isn't worth it. Added a new level up system. Mithril Seeds now working 97% New Fight Cave system [We know about the Jad bug and are still working on a fix] The Achievements tab (the tab between the quest tab and inventory) is now a player's online list.
2 new commands have been added for the general public: ::changelevel skillID newLevelHere and ::getmaxlevel skillID
-Week Three- Added the android control system on a unique port Re-wrote the dialogues, includes organization. More cleaning. Re-wrote boss drops More organization Added a couple customs
-Week Two- Increased mining XP 10x+ Fixed the levelpoint bug where if you jump more than 1 level, you get 1 point. Fixed Hunter bugs. Fixed summoning bugs Added new level up interfaces (They have the correct skill icon on them.)
Fixed owner ::master command [Was requested to be fixed by Jal] Added Tab-To-Reply PM system New Runecrafting Alter Selection interface Fixed the quick chat buttons (click on the skill icon to quick chat). New Command New home New boss
-Week One- [In no specific order of what got done] Patched client, so it only connects with our UID Re-wrote the titles Fixed severe connection bug, where anyone could potentially take over a staff members account Fixed ::noclip, so if anyone not an owner tries it, they are kicked(or banned, haven't decided). Removed loads of unused sprites, creating a smaller cache Re-wrote all server commands. This was need as it was clunky, had moronic commands. Fixed the money pouch [/code]
I'm currently working on my own custom zombie game. It's not like the normal one you see in servers (Mine has it, but I don't like it.)
[b]Media:[/b] Runecrafting Altar Selection: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cCRG5HG.png[/img] Trade screen: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Zr9ZvDk.png[/img] Home boss (the blue thing is a charm from previous kill): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bqIauim.png[/img] Yell/Chat. All ranked players are forced to have that rank shown (they cannot change it under and circumstances): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5N3S43M.png[/img] Kept On Death Screen (Value ranked in cfg.) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SaBRIm8.png[/img] Equipment Screen: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BIImesD.png[/img] Farming: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7qtLX4tkgwY[/youtube] Got a brand new 100% custom (all done by me) XP lock system [Thanks to moparians for helping with by bugs] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KSVTxU6v86c[/youtube]
Coming soon: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kaW6xei.png[/img] [Need a new name for this quest]
[hr]
[b]The Team:[/b] Jal - Jal is the head website developer, and has handled everything I needed him to on the website. That's.. About all :) (he's an owner in game, bla bla bla).
Mod Sk8r (Sk8rdude461) - I'm the head Server and Client developer, handling everything for the game. I take all user input (if any) and see how it looks, before implementing it in the game (unless the idea just isn't fit. etc). I attempt to fix all bugs, and all issues if we have them. I literally run the whole server.
JavaLearner - My Co-Developer and coder. He's helped a lot with things I got stuck on, and our server is better than ever because of his help.
-Maybe I should get them to write bio's on themselves? Lol.
The server I started with was clunky and had loads of useless junk, and just is nasty over all. So I'm trying to clean it, and make it better (in my eyes) simply because I wanted to.
[b]Note:[/b] We also need an advertiser. This pertains making images, or editing them, Making advertisement threads, making videos, and more.

item.title: NyxOnline - Public Beta
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:70, topic:494525”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=612755.msg4289301#msg4289301 date=1366928920]

[quote author=Cruel Truth link=topic=612755.msg4288945#msg4288945 date=1366886645]

This is dumb as hell. I don’t know why you are even trying…(loooooooooooooooooool)
Im jking with ya brah, looks nice, i suggest u update thread :c

Updates have been slow as we have no beta players to help.

ill test
[/quote]^ still no link…

Oh really now?
Read the main topic again:

Website: Nyx-Online [You must be registered for 90% of the site ]
[size=1]approved by Ruby[/size]

[/quote]remember I was the cutie who said I am not giving out my ip to every little hawtie who walks the street ;)[/quote]
Then what is your point of being on here.
There’s a link, and if you were to sign up on my server. You’d be “giving me your ip” as is. If you signed up on the forums, you’d be again “giving me your ip”. Either way, I get it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Cruel Truth:

even better, we could post bugs on the actual development thread, after all that’s the point of it!

Why not impact the server’s activity in a positive manner and leave comments in this thread for constructive criticism, and join the NyxOnline forums to report bugs?

Read full topic

I assume I don’t need to register on site or anything for the testing?

How else would you tell me bugs? :hurr:
[/quote]private messages via mopar etc there are several other alternatives.[/quote]

I check Mopar at school and I’ll likely forget that you sent me a bug or something.

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

JavaLearner:

Bumpie bump

Thank you.

In Recent News:
JavaLearner had to deal with some family related issues, which is not my business to discuss. I was busy all of last week cleaning my house and everything. So little got done. We’re also struggling to add/fix content as we don’t have enough dedicated beta testers.

Read full topic
